website_summaries.verdict: A quality choice if you want to keep wine cool on a picnic or camping trip.
pros: Growler that resembles wine bottle holds a 750-milliliter bottle of wine
Comes with collapsible funnel to make pouring easy and mess-free
Comes with cleaning brush to fit down long neck
Lid screws on securely and prevents leaks
cons: Color choices limited to shiny red or green
Not as easy to clean as wider-mouth growlers

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for picnics
customer_reviews.text: Great for picnics! Kept wine well-chilled for as long as we needed it. Hint: put the thermos, top off, in the freezer for an hour or more before you fill it and this will increase its effectiveness. Comes with a clever collapsible funnel that really works well, and a cleaning brush.
customer_reviews.author: Terende

customer_reviews.title: Small but they are sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Tiny but strong snap hooks. I couldn't understand the size of these snap hooks. So I was a bit disappointed when the snap hooks arrived. The snap hooks are strong though and I use them for my keys. I attached a photo of a regular snap hook on the left and a this snap hook on the right to show you they are small.
customer_reviews.author: Princess Fireworks

customer_reviews.title: Holds whole bottle of wine & no leaks!
customer_reviews.text: Good little bottle. It fits a whole bottle of wine. It does not leak. Great for concerts that don't allow glass. Not for carbonated stuff. I know someone is going to ask. No. That's how you lose an eye. Just don't. Wine, water, juice, whiskey...no soda guys. Come on. Didn't notice any weird flavor imparted by the stainless steel, but my wine wasn't in there too long. Girls weekend at HSB doesnt let alcohol sit too long. Not super insulating; kept the reds room temp and the whites cool but not cold. Throw it in an ice chest if you want it to stay cold.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Nice blanket if only about a foot longer
customer_reviews.text: This blanket arrived with dirt on the edges, and appeared to be handled carelessly while in the warehouse. Aside from that, the blanket itself was warm and soft, however it is smaller than I had hoped. If using it while sitting, you can drape it from your shoulders and it covers you nicely. If you are using this while laying down, it falls short of my feet at least a foot (I am 5' 5") so it was irritating. At this price point, I think it's adequate, but not the best for the money spent. Quality was what you would expect from Columbia, hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Famof4

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased a wine growler back in December 2018 for myself and loved it. I will normally have it on it's side in my fridge and have had no leaking issues with it. It also does keep wine cool for hours after chilling it. :) I have started ordering them for gifts for other wine lovers in my life and recently had an issue where I ordered 2 different colors and they sent me 2 growlers with the same color. I sent an email to reach out about an exchange and they were super fast with their response and very helpful on getting this fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten M

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect way to take wine to the pool or beach! Perfect temp for all day?
customer_reviews.author: Honeybun335

customer_reviews.title: Columbia Cozy Fleece Thermal Throw
customer_reviews.text: I already had one Columbia Cozy Fleece Thermal Throw, and I liked it so much I ordered another one. This speaks volumes of how much I like this product. It's light, and yet it keeps you very, very warm. Also, it's very easy to wash and dry.
customer_reviews.author: K Agresta

customer_reviews.title: Next time, send correct item.
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be ok and of good quality for the price. Only 3 stars as I ordered the Rose Gold color and they sent a Silver one. The box was labeled Rose, but the item is clearly plain silver. Don't offer options if you aren't going to provide them. : (
customer_reviews.author: xenawp

customer_reviews.title: COLOR NOT CORRECT
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the Stainless Steel. On the box it says "Stainless Steel", but the bottle itself is a soft rose color. Least Favorite color ever... The bottle is neat enough, can't put a pour spout in it as the mouth of the bottle is larger than a traditional wine bottle. I re-checked the colors to re-order and did not see rose/pink as a selection, so am afraid if I return and re-order, I will just receive the same color if I select stainless steel again. Did not see this info on the reviews, so it was definitely not what I was expecting. Hope it helps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for flights and home
customer_reviews.text: Room this on a long flight to Spain. It is thicker than the blankets provided by the airlines, it was large enough for my partner and I to share, but barely. It’s more square than rectangle shape. We bought 2 but took 1 bc we wanted to do carry on only. This blanket is good for the price and I now use it at home too
customer_reviews.author: HungryDonut

customer_reviews.title: Utility wine container
customer_reviews.text: Nice bottle , great for boating or around the pool. Recommend pairing with a good wine carrier. Capacity is for stand 750 ML wine bottle
customer_reviews.author: TAB

customer_reviews.title: Works to keep wine chilled
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, works as advertised. Kept wine cold for a couple of hours and then we drank it! Will be using this all summer by the pool. Will probably buy an additional one.
customer_reviews.author: SunnyD65

customer_reviews.title: VERY PRETTY, GOOD QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: GOOD PRODUCT FOR THOSE PARTIES WHERE PEOPLE CAN'T KEEP THEIR HANDS TO THEMSELVES (HAHA)
customer_reviews.author: D. S.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Wine freezing cold!
customer_reviews.text: I got this on a whim, thinking it would be great for gatherings and summer events that are outside and boy, was I right! It's so simple to use, just rinse with cold water and pour the whole bottle of wine in! Keeps it cold for HOURS and the funnel that comes with it is so handy! Even comes with a really sturdy brush to clean it. Perfect gift for wine lovers!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amandeezy

customer_reviews.title: gift basket
customer_reviews.text: All the items in this box were good. The only reason I gave it 3 stars is that it was in my opinion a sample box due to its size of the items. The size of the products were what you would get if someone was handing out samples for you to try. They tasted good but it wasn't worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: PRODUCTS ARE SMALLER THAN IN PICTURE
customer_reviews.text: I saw it at my sister's and didn't realize the ham was so small. It's not enough for over one person!! The coffee isn't either. The picture is deceiving. A bigger assortment is needed for two or more people.
customer_reviews.author: Granny73

customer_reviews.title: Nice blanket for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and good quality fleece blanket. I use mine for decorative purposes. Def not big enough for an adult to use as a blanket. I’m 5’3 and it doesn’t cover my feet. Can’t beat the price tho.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: REally works.
customer_reviews.text: My husband has central pain syndrome and is always cold. I got him this blanket hoping it would work, and it really did. He has not complained of being cold at night since he started to use it. Will order another one. Just wish it was a bit bigger.
customer_reviews.author: anne marshall Bullard

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: It does work for how thin it is. I knocked one star since its a little small even for a throw blanket. I ended up giving it to my son since for me it is just too small. I'm a big guy. Even my wife who is skinny 5'4 thought it was just too small. Price is a little high for this but I will keep it.
customer_reviews.author: 5 Star Ace

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought to sneak in wine to local concert venue. Keeps wine cold.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Buck

customer_reviews.title: Don’t send as a gift- looks cheap
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for my son. He sent me a picture. I was so embarrassed. It looked so cheap.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Great warmth & super light weight!
customer_reviews.text: Love the warmth! I first got it for my 14 year old cat so he can be extra warm on our couch but it is soooo nice and warm, we are sharing it. Really wish they made king size and different colors...when they do, I would purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Beneatha Foxx

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Very warm! But a little short for me. I really wish that Columbia made bigger blankets and home goods. The heat side on this and the hot dots in the jackets work and would love a comforter or sleeping bag
customer_reviews.author: G. L my name

customer_reviews.title: For me colour was important.
customer_reviews.text: Just received the wine vacuum flask. Ordered red, received silver. Normally colour would not be an issue but I live in extremely humid tropical climate, even my stainless steel fridge rusts. Was hoping the colour coating would extend the stainless life.
customer_reviews.author: Vat

customer_reviews.title: Excellent wine container
customer_reviews.text: Great for brining wine to my out door concerts and plays.
customer_reviews.author: S. Guinee

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Good blanket - soft & warm. However, it's bulky and "stiff" and not very pliable, so you can't really get cozy and tuck it around you. But it looks great and provides a lot of warmth.
customer_reviews.author: SW Virginia Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This throw is a great value for this price ($8.99). It is just the right size for sitting in a chair. It does seem to help with keeping warm. The fact that it is machine washable as well as tumble dry low—even better! Bought another. Would recommend to a friend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Need to give the right color selected!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a green one ( my favorite color) and received a red one when delivered :( did not have time to return because I needed to use it for a beach day. The bottle worked well. Just wanted it in green...
customer_reviews.author: darnell

customer_reviews.title: Easy to manage size
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight warmth. Easy to manage size. Very vivid color. I'd like it even better if it was an inch or two bigger so I could wrap up in it. I wouldn't mind having several of these around to use not only on the deck but also in the car and house especially for the grandkids.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa P.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for a breakfast for two
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift. It was something different for friends. They loved it. Quick shipping via FedEx.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Seriously the warmest coziest blanket! I kept mine in ...
customer_reviews.text: Seriously the warmest coziest blanket! I kept mine in car for cold winter & as emergency backup ; will move to camping gear for summer months
customer_reviews.author: Alli

customer_reviews.title: Mostly As Expected
customer_reviews.text: Delivered wrong color, but other than that it’s as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amy E. Gideon

customer_reviews.title: Always appreciated
customer_reviews.text: Everyone to whom I send Swiss Colony gifts always loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money
customer_reviews.text: Really stunning wine growler. It came in a black cardboard box and would make a great gift for anyone who likes wine and outdoor activities.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Warmest blanket out there
customer_reviews.text: The warmest blanket I have. I wish it was longer though, as a person average height my feet stick out.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hawks

customer_reviews.title: The little funnel is perfect and the brush bery useful
customer_reviews.text: High quality metal and def fits bottle of wine. The little funnel is perfect and the brush bery useful. Bought it for my bridesmaids and bachelorette party. Huge hit at the vineyard!
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and the recipients were very pleased with this gift.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Holness

customer_reviews.title: This went along with two other food packs and well recieved
customer_reviews.text: My aunt and uncle are both hard to buy for so I got 3 packs of food for breakfast and they loved it
customer_reviews.author: David Carr

customer_reviews.title: Great for Picnics
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the wine cool and great for outdoor use. Easy to pour the wine in with the cup provided.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Biggar

customer_reviews.title: Expected Silver
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t realize that the items were pink in color. I thought they would be silver. One was to be a gift for a guy. They are nice though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect around the pool
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for putting your bottle of Rose when you are around the pool. No glass and it stays cool, exactly what I needed and well... it looks like a bottle of wine!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick From Texas

customer_reviews.title: wrong color
customer_reviews.text: was supposed to be rose gold but came silver - stainless steel not as pretty
customer_reviews.author: VICTORIA GUNRAJ

customer_reviews.title: Love this Growler
customer_reviews.text: Love this product and gifted it for a white elephant.
customer_reviews.author: crenee**

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and comes with its own bottle brush for cleaning
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 5 of these as Christmas gifts. 2 silver and 3 red. I thought the red ones were beautiful and would purchase again. Very shiny. Loved that they came with bottle brushes and funnels.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Very good bottle
customer_reviews.text: Very good slim profile taking less room then even the bottle of wine. Has a very rich ring tone when tapped on. The cap seals very secure. Very good customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite blankets!
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually like fleece blankets, but this one made me change my mind. It washes well and worked great while camping in Wyoming. I only wish it was a couple feet longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps me warmer than my other blankets do and I love it. My favorite brand of jacket and blanket ...
customer_reviews.text: Very warm and cozy. Keeps me warmer than my other blankets do and I love it. My favorite brand of jacket and blanket now.
customer_reviews.author: Roydo67

customer_reviews.title: The red is beautiful. It was purchased for a Holiday gift exchange ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality product, and arrived on time. The red is beautiful. It was purchased for a Holiday gift exchange and was "stolen" several times as everyone wanted it! I will be ordering more in other colors. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Crisp

customer_reviews.title: Love this fleece throw
customer_reviews.text: Warm, warm, warn is all I can say! Love this fleece throw!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Duncan

customer_reviews.title: This thing is great! Great for wine
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great! Great for wine, beer, or any drink you want to keep cold. Works well to keep in a bag Like a purse or something.
customer_reviews.author: Torre Sutton

customer_reviews.title: Super warm and cozy
customer_reviews.text: The color appears more blue online, but the blanket is light grey. The material is really nice and thick and soft. It is a little smaller than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing, its great quality and I will be using this item until it falls apart!
customer_reviews.author: Kierian Kirby

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great - got for son to keep in his truck
customer_reviews.author: nj100001

customer_reviews.title: Bought as gift and they loved it. Product shipped quicker than estimated
customer_reviews.text: Bought as gift and they loved it. Product shipped quicker than estimated.
customer_reviews.author: Maribel

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift and the family liked it much!
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Mom & Grand-mom said it was good..
customer_reviews.text: Mom & Grand-mom said it was good......great holiday gift if ya in a bind or can't come up with something.
customer_reviews.author: J.A.J

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for someone else. They said they enjoyed it and sent me a pic.
customer_reviews.author: Sojame

customer_reviews.title: and they enjoyed it!
customer_reviews.text: I sent this as a Christmas gift, and they enjoyed it!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very light, thermal, and wish it was a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I get filling much better! I use everynight
customer_reviews.text: my body temperature is very low, always cold and I use this thermal blanket make my body temperature normal . I get filling much better! I use everynight. thank you so much
customer_reviews.author: kwang

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Wine Growler
customer_reviews.text: I got the Wine Growler today, and I am very impressed. This is a high-quality wine growler with a stainless steel outside and inside. The top screws on tightly so we never have to be concerned if the bottle tips over. The growler even comes with a cleaning brush and filling funnel, very handy. Very impressed with this purchase and recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: JohnDVDM

customer_reviews.title: Plushy on one side, Scratchy on another
customer_reviews.text: It's a tad bit uncomfortable on one side. The underlying insulation "thermal coil" it uses on one side is scratchy and feels like plastic. I can't deny that it works, because it was nice to keep me warm, but I could feel the scratching of the blanket grate on my skin at times, and even still through a layer of clothing. I'd flip it over, but then the "thermal coil" helping to keep heat in doesn't work to my benefit and I'm stuck feeling a bit colder because of it. I eventually stopped using this as a throw and now as a second blanket on top of my first one.
customer_reviews.author: ShadowfoX

customer_reviews.title: Loving my new wine carriers for events
customer_reviews.text: Great product when you cannot take glass to venues. This project will hold an entire bottle of wine. I purchased a red for red wines and a silver for whites. They also can be placed in the freezer prior to using to keep your whites at a great temperature! I also purchased the stemless wine glasses to go with them! They definitely were a big hit at the party!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality! Columbia never disappoints! We bought four! Much nicer than an electric throw/blanket! (Keep one in the car for chilly days/nights) Machine wash & dry well - no pilling. My mom is diabetic, has neuropathy issues and is always cold - especially her feet/legs. Her medical team does not want her using an electric blanket because of burn risks with her neuropathy issues - this blanket keeps her toasty warm and she loves it! She never complains about being cold any more. Thank you, Columbia!!!
customer_reviews.author: L.A. Blu

customer_reviews.title: May not get what you ordered
customer_reviews.text: Updating this review to 3 stars because it is a good product. Still very disappointed that the order wasn’t correctly fulfilled. Super disappointed. Ordered this as a last minute gift and it arrived and is the wrong color (ordered the rose gold and got silver) and doesn’t have the funnel described. I am to gift it tomorrow so there’s no way to fix this. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: S C Zack

customer_reviews.title: If you love wine...you will like this product
customer_reviews.text: OMG...I didn’t even know a wine growler even existed. This has been perfect for all of my outdoor outings. Put it in the freezer over night (and wine in ‘fridge if you an extra chill) if you’re going to be outside and it remains chilled in 98 degree weather ALL DAY. No leaking with the bottle on it’s side. And it’s perfect if you are just going from one spot to another without worry of dropping it and the bottle shattering.
customer_reviews.author: D. Neeley

customer_reviews.title: Very cozy and warm!
customer_reviews.text: I own a Columbia queen size blanket (with the same coils) that I purchased at Home goods for $30 ! It is so light and has kept me warm all winter! I knew I got a bargain when I looked on Amazon for another one and found one through a third seller for$179 ... "Like new" So I got myself the sofa throw and I like it very much, it will probably get a little more pliable after a few washes, your color assortment could be expanded, in my opinion. so thank you for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Traute G

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size and So Soft
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is so soft and the perfect size when sitting in a comfy chair relaxing. One side is plush and the other side is more like a weave. It doesn't keep me as warm as I had hoped but that's probably just me. I wish it came in more colors. I would definitely by this again.
customer_reviews.author: Tami Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great to take to the pool.
customer_reviews.text: We moved to a place with a great community pool but no glass allowed! We can pour a bottle of chilled white wine into this thing, take it to the pool, and we are good to go. Stays cool even in the hot sun. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: R. Meldrum

customer_reviews.title: Best thing so far!!!
customer_reviews.text: Brought 3 of these and all my 3 pups are loving them!!! It's very light weight but super comfy. Sheds very little even when the the younger pups scratches them to get ready for sleepy time and he is currently 270lbs. SUPER EASY TO WASH!!! Now I can put all 3 of their sleeping blanket along with their toys in the same load!!!
customer_reviews.author: ITZSUSU

customer_reviews.title: Warm and not too heavy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my mother because she is always cold, she likes it a lot the blanket is light and provides enough warm for her. Her only complaint was she wish it would be bigger and more color selection
customer_reviews.author: Phuong Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Super cool item to purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the coolest items I’ve purchased. The color is awesome and it looks super stylish. I used it for my wine that I took to the Hollywood bowl. Kept the wine cold and it is spill proof. I think I’ll buy more to give out for gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Jones

customer_reviews.title: LOVE the funnel and brush that comes with it
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this to give as a Christmas gift. After opening it and checking it out, I've decided I'll need to order *another* one for the gift....I'm keeping this for myself!! I can't wait to keep my wine cold for HOURS on hot summer days - on boat rides - on the beach. LOVE the funnel and brush that comes with it! It's a great price for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this throw. It was a bit larger than expected so that was nice. Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Yramirez

customer_reviews.title: If you're looking for an insulated wine bottle, this is the one!!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this insulated bottle. Love the color, that it comes with a funnel and brush, and most of all it kept my white wine as cold as from the fridge for 4 hours, and I'll bet it would continue for longer, but that's all it took to finish off the bottle! And when you pour, it doesn't drip!
customer_reviews.author: mizcarol765

customer_reviews.title: Awesome wine Growler
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome for the price. Will make a great gift for the holidays.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Sleek bottle keeps wine chilled!
customer_reviews.text: Great way to transport an entire bottle of wine to a concert or picnic. Easy to transfer from glass wine bottle due to funnel provided, and a handy brush for cleaning is also included.
customer_reviews.author: S. C. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great Wine Bottle
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect. For white wine, I chill it for 24 hours prior to using it (fill it with ice). This is great for parks with no glass rules.
customer_reviews.author: Suessa8

customer_reviews.title: Great teacher gift idea!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as Christmas presents for my daughters teachers!! They loved them since they weren't like the other gifts they received. Can be used for wine or other items too!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer K

customer_reviews.title: Pretty in red
customer_reviews.text: Got it for a gift so don't know how well it functions yet but the red color is gorgeous and I think my sis will love it!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen V.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice product, I got it for gift exchange for one of our Christmas parties. I love it I love the color very nice I'm sure whoever gets it will really really enjoy it I may have to buy my own
customer_reviews.author: Ldympr

customer_reviews.title: These are AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: These wine holders make great and very affordable gifts, everyone that gets them loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Luisa

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Warm enough, not the biggest but it is a nice texture. Very slight chemical smell out of box, nothing terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Dirty
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived dirty so I was a bit disappointed. Will be using once the temps get a bit cooler..
customer_reviews.author: Jamie L

customer_reviews.title: Soft
customer_reviews.text: My wife just thinks that this will be very helpful in keeping her warm next winter on the couch. She just loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Willie Willie

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Tested with ice & water held 38° for 24 hrs. Also boiling water 200°-12 hrs later 150° works well
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect item for ‘BYOB’ events
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect item for ‘BYOB’ events! It has also become the perfect Christmas gift for all my friends-especially those that seem to have everything! It is easy to clean and looks a lot classier than just tossing a bottle of wine in the cooler for a cookout. It keeps beverages chilled for a very long time and I would recommend it to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Fox

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this - kept my white wine nice and chilled all day at the beach. :)

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and quality. It was a gift to a friend so haven’t used it
customer_reviews.author: lyneee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Works just as advertised. Very warm and is just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: phil

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Like: Everything. Don't think this would ever leak in your luggage. Dislike: Nothing
customer_reviews.author: kman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Buy this. It kept me from shivering all night while camping.
customer_reviews.author: katrina farris

customer_reviews.title: Amazing super light and warm
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly warm. I love how light it feels yet how warm it makes me.
customer_reviews.author: Redsoxyourmom

customer_reviews.title: a dud, a huge dud.
customer_reviews.text: I washed it and it fell apart, HORRIBLE, DONT BUY .
customer_reviews.author: BearBear

customer_reviews.title: Great blanket
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and worth the price. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse D

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size to use in a recliner or chair
customer_reviews.text: A very plush throw and definitely Columbia quality. Might be too warm for Spring or Fall. Perfect size to use in a recliner or chair.
customer_reviews.author: L S

customer_reviews.title: Good light but insulating blanket.
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our son to use on a wintertime school trip. It was lightweight and also insulating. It's now being used at home as a blanket for when curling up on the sofa to watch movies!
customer_reviews.author: Woody

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hope it was as good as stated as was a gift and you really never know!
customer_reviews.author: hkw

product_meta.title: Coastline Vine Wine Growler - Stainless Steel Triple Insulated Double Walled Wine Bottle Vacuum Flask Canteen Aerator Gift Accessory 750ml/25oz with Funnel and Brush - RED
product_meta.description: Make the Coastline Vine Wine Growler the next great addition to your wine collection! This beautiful and minimalist Growler design can be artfully displayed anywhere in your home, creating a stylish and useful centerpiece. When ready for use it can hold up to 750ml/25oz; the equivalent to one whole bottle of wine. Premium Kitchen Grade 18/18 Stainless-Steel! Our kitchen grade stainless-steel guarantees that your Growler stays completely rust free throughout use. Triple Insulation Technology! Coastline Vine Wine Growlers are made with three separate layers of insulation to ensure that all your drinks stay cold (or warm) for up to 24 hours. In addition to keeping your drinks temperature controlled for your enjoyment, the Growler body is highly durable and comes with a clear, non-scratch outer coating to protect it from travel damage. Take your Growler anywhere from the front porch to camping without worry of wear and tear! No Limits! Why limit yourself? The Coastline Vine Wine Growler can be used for any drink, including carbonated beverages! A wonderful gift idea for any holiday season or celebration. In this special offer we include a Silicone, Easy-Pour funnel and 13-inch wire cleaning brush to ensure the best possible experience while using the Coastline Vine Wine Growler.
feature_bullets: KEEP YOUR FAVORITE DRINK COLD OR HOT FOR UP TO 24HOURS - In addition to its full 750ml/25oz size, you can now keep your drinks as hot or as cold as you want for up to 24hours with this Triple Insulated Vacuum Flask Growler

INCLUDES FUNNEL AND WIRE CLEANING BRUSH - Comes with 2 extra products courtesies of Coastline Vine. A Specialized, Easy-to-Wash, Self-Folding, Silicone funnel to help with your wine transferring to the Growler. Also, a FULL-SIZED 13” Wire Cleaning Brush to help you clean those hard to reach areas down inside of your Growler

PORTABLE AND READY TO GO - Take the party with you when you go Hiking, Fishing, Picnics, Boating, Camping, to the neighbors, or just out on the front porch! The clear, scratch-preventive coating on every bottle and Shatterproof design makes it extra durable against the elements and able to bring with you anywhere the party goes

UNIQUE, ELEGANT, & REAL WINE BOTTLE SHAPE - Be the envy of your neighbors and the next trendsetter with this beautiful minimalist design that could easily be the centerpiece on the dinner table, or thanks to its real wine bottle shape, another great addition to your wine rack

QUALITY FOR A LIFETIME - With our Triple Insulated bottle, a Double Walled Stainless-Steel Growler with a special, one-of-a-kind, Third Wall keeps your drinks just as hot or cold as you wanted them! Made of only the BEST KITCHEN GRADE 18/18 STAINLESS STEEL keeps it all Rust Free and easy to clean
